swistrackcomponent.name: Calibration with a linear model
swistrackcomponent.description: This method uses the TSAI coplanar calibration method to transform the image coordinates in world coordinates.

parameter.name: Ncx

parameter.name: Nfx
parameter.label: Number of pixels in frame grabber's x direction

parameter.name: dx

parameter.name: dy
parameter.label: Y dimension of camera's sensor element (in mm)

parameter.name: Cx
parameter.label: Z axis intercept of camera coordinate system

parameter.name: Cy
parameter.label: Z axis intercept of camera coordinate system

parameter.name: sx
parameter.label: Scale factor to compensate for any error in dx
